title: Oh No They Didn't! TOO FUNNY
author: umlautthoni

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017074312im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hysterical2smiley-1_5228.gif)

So that's where Kraftwerk went since the 80s...

I'm pretty sure it's pronounced 'Noytraface' as in the German Neue. Well that's how Rich Roat pronounced it when I spoke to him.

Nick Cooke
Magnificent ginger beard a little Gillish
I'm almost too embarassed to admit that I had to Google Rich Roat. :|

_I’m pretty sure it’s pronounced ’Noytraface’ as in the German Neue._

You are correct, Nick. [The video is posted on YouTube](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017074312/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHCu28bfxSI), where the makers explain that they did not know the correct pronunciation of "Neutra" when they made their parody: " 'NEUTRA' is actually pronounced 'NOY-trah', but that escaped our knowledge in the throws [sic] of fun we were having doing this project. Word."

I'm also not sure they fully understand the concept of am em-space when they say Futura's is "too wide". Gotta commend them for the amount of effort they put in to it though; definitely one of the most elaborate examples of type nerd humor that I've seen.

_I’m almost too embarassed to admit that I had to Google Rich Roat._

I had to Google Lady Gaga. Then I wished I hadn't.

John, try this, you might like her here

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NM51qOpwcIM](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017074312/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=NM51qOpwcIM "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NM51qOpwcIM")
Thank you for the link, this is wonderful.
